Sentencas: Electrochemical measurements on solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) often uncover unusual readings.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: These are then ascribed to unknown material properties or newly discovered physical effects.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, a closer look shows that these are simply errors mostly test artefacts.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Our group has isolated many causes of error and developed reliable techniques to avoid them, focusing on open circuit voltage (OCV) measurement, current/voltage (i/v) curves and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This paper aims to help researchers avoid errors through balanced choice of apparatus and test procedure.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Simple to implement test-sequences are set out to avoid errors.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: First, test-bench wiring, hardware limitations and apparatus selection are detailed to avoid error sources.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Secondly, measurement settings and how they impact measurement results are discussed.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Our developed procedures avoid the majority of errors; this is exhaustively tested at operationally relevant conditions.
Titulo: Practical Guidelines for Reliable Electrochemical Characterization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
